definition[0]: a small piece of metal, cloth, or plastic with a picture or words on it, worn to show rank, membership of a group, support for a political idea etc
example[0]: We were each handed a badge with our name on it.
definition[1]: a small piece of metal or plastic that you carry to show people that you work for a particular organization, for example that you are a police officer
definition[2]: a small piece of cloth with a picture on it, given to scouts, guides etc to show what skills they have learned
example[1]: Steve won a photography badge in the Boy Scouts.
definition[3]: an icon that provides a link to another web page, for example to your page on a social networking site
example[2]: How do I add a badge to my blog?
